mintydocs-noparentpage:
An error message. Parameters:
 $1 - a page type
mintydocs-invalidparentpage:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a page name
* $2 - a page type
mintydocs-product-versionlist: A header above a list of links for different versions of some product.
mintydocs-version-desc:
A header for a page about one version of a product. Parameters:
* $1 - a version number
* $2 - a product name
mintydocs-version-manuallist: A header for a list of instruction manuals.
mintydocs-manual-desc:
A descriptive header for a page that is an instruction manual. Parameters:
* $1 - a version number
* $2 - a product name
mintydocs-manual-otherversions: Read this manual for other versions:
mintydocs-manual-contents: A header above a table of contents.
mintydocs-topic-desc:
A header for a page about one topic. Parameters:
* $1 - a manual name
*2 - a version number
* $3 - a product name
mintydocs-topic-otherversions: Read this topic for other versions:
